data.message: Im like a plane, I just fly by, when im in my new ride, im like a lambo, im so fast yo, haha you no. can you hear the base? Ya that’s comin from my place.  ridin down the street, hear the poundin of the feet, ya u no u cant lay a beat, that could beat me, ya, yall better flee. Im a million-air, hardly thinks its fair, drummers name erik bear, but I don’t think you’d care, if I shot the flare. Do you even dare?
